data.title: The Masters Touch Salon
data.meta_description: Transform your look with our expert stylists
data.text:
Shawn, the proud owner and Creative Director of The Master's Touch Salon, brings over 20 years of expertise as a master stylist and four years of service in the United States Navy. Originally from Oklahoma, he graduated from Tulsa Academy in 1992.

Known for his attention to detail, Shawn strives to offer each guest a customized and distinctive experience. His contemporary and stylish designs are perfect for any occasion, whether it's a daytime outing or an evening event. With his extensive background, clients can trust that they will walk out of The Master's Touch Salon with a trendy and personalized look that fits their individual preferences.

Shawn's got an eye for detail and always aims to provide his guests with a personalized and unique approach. He is known for his modern and chic styles that suit both day and evening events. With his experience, every guest at The Master's Touch Salon is guaranteed to leave with a fresh and fashionable look that suits their needs.

I am a Cosmetologist of 45 years, completing my training in Newark, Ohio in 1979 at The Licking County Joint Vocational School.

I am trained in multiple coloring and styling lines to include American Crew, Big Sexy Hair, Deva Curl, 4 Hair, ISO, Kenra, Keratage, Matrix, Paul Mitchell, Redken and Schwarzkopf. I have also attended and completed multiple administrative and technical training programs.

I look forward to serving you.

Elle is a proud FL native & 2nd generation stylist with over 20 years experience in customer service & creative expression. As a natural born artist, Elle plunged into cosmetology and graduated from Paul Mitchell the School Jax in 2009 and has built her portfolio in all aspects of the beauty industry. Her experience behind the chair, working in print and production, the full art of make-up as well as educating has made her a well rounded artist at her craft. Elle is passionate about creating on all canvases with a keen eye for detail and precision.

Elle firmly believes that every interaction is an opportunity to extend a hand love and looks forward to build lasting relationships with all her clients.

Hi there! My name is Julinda and I have a passion for hair. I graduated in Albania in 2018, where I was born and raised. Shortly after, I moved to NYC where I honed my hair styling skills and obtained my first USA cosmetology license. As a stylist, I am a great listener and take the time to understand my clients' needs and wants. Continuous education is important to me, as I like to stay up-to-date on the latest trends and styles. I offer a wide range of services including beautiful highlights, balayage, color, long layers, different haircuts styles, men and kids haircuts, and threading. Beauty is my thing! I believe in the power of my craft to uplift others. Apart from that, I am a nature lover and enjoy traveling. Looking forward to meeting you all!
